description: This file defines the main layout component for a React frontend application. It includes navigation, sidebar, project selector, global date range picker, and content outlet, orchestrating the overall structure of the app.

methods.name: GlobalDateSelector
methods.description: A React component for selecting a date range, dispatching the selection to the Redux store.

methods.name: RootLayout
methods.description: Main layout component that includes navigation, sidebar, project selector, and outlet for nested routes.
